channel.title: Anti-Mass!

item.title: Anti-Mass!
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Well I set a timer on an object so you can only click it and get the reward every 10 seconds (for now) but when I spam it I can’t move I have to wait (depending on how many times I clicked) to move.

I tried all the following that if the timer is greater than 1:

resetArray(clicks); clickIndex = 0; resetWalkingQueue(); animationReset = 0; resetAnimation(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

Yet nothing, could anyone help?

Read full topic
